```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

  
# Loading raw data

Location_data <- read_xlsx("place.pop.precip.war.xlsx", sheet = 3, trim_ws = TRUE)
Population_data <- read_xlsx("place.pop.precip.war.xlsx", sheet = 4, trim_ws = TRUE)
Precipitation_data <- read_xlsx("place.pop.precip.war.xlsx", sheet = 5, trim_ws = TRUE)
War_data <- read_xlsx("place.pop.precip.war.xlsx", sheet = 6, trim_ws = TRUE)

#Cleaning Location Data

Loc_data_clean <- Location_data %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  select("primary", "population_data_name", "climate_data_name", "war_data_ccode", "war_data_state_name", "latitude", "longitude") 
  

```
